en-CA.summary: Generates a three-word buzz phrase to be used in reports and presentations
examplePhrases: Alexa ask buzz phrase to use two zero three
Alexa, tell buzz phrase to use four six seven
en-CA.name: Buzz phrase
en-CA.description: Are you writing a report or a presentation? Want to live dangerously? Well, just a little bit? This skill will generate a three-word meaningless buzz phrase from three digits that you speak to it. The challenge is that, if you choose to try this out, then you must promise to include the resulting meaningless buzz phrase in your report or presentation. The question is: will anyone notice? Will it be accepted? The chance of exposure is small, but it is not zero. It's up to you to find the best place to hide the buzz phrase you are given. Now, go for it!  Think of a three-digit number. Speak your three digits clearly, with a phrase like "Alexa, ask buzz phrase to use two zero three."  There is no personal data involved in this skill.
